show_name: Chronicles of the Going Home Club (TV)
plot: When asked which school club she would be interested in, Natsuki replied "the go-home club". To her surprise, though, it turns out that there actually is such a club at her school, and she ends up joining the club reluctantly. Karin Touno also joined the "Going Home Club" with Natsuki Andou, which at that time consist only of three members: Sakura Doumyouji, Botan Oohagi and Claire Kokonoe. In this club they discuss almost about everything, jokes and plays round.
opening_theme: "2 Gakki Debut Daisakusen!!" (2学期デビュー大作戦!!) by Otome Shintō
ending_theme: "Wakuwaku DAYS☆" (ワクワクDAYS☆) by Ibuki Kido, Miharu Kobayashi (eps 1-3)
"Kimi ni tsuite Ieru Koto (キミについて言えること)" by Mitsuki Yūna and Ayaka Senbongi (eps 8-10)
